payload.title: Diagram: Use task title for node labels
payload.description:
This task addresses a bug in the diagram generator where the `TaskRecord.title` field is ignored for rendering node labels. Currently, the generator incorrectly extracts a title from the first line of the `TaskRecord.description`, leading to inconsistent and often truncated labels in the diagram.

The fix requires modifying the `RelationshipAnalyzer` to use the `task.title` field directly when building diagram nodes. This will ensure that the diagram accurately reflects the intended concise title of a task, improving readability and consistency.

**Location of Bug:**
- File: `packages/core/src/diagram_generator/relationship_analyzer.ts`
- Method: `buildNodes`

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. The `buildNodes` method in `RelationshipAnalyzer` must be updated to use `task.title`.
2. The `extractTitleFromDescription` helper method should be removed as it will no longer be needed.
3. The final generated diagram must display the content of the `TaskRecord.title` field for all task nodes.
